item.title: A Real Pain Review: Jesse Eisenberg's Second Directorial Feature Is A Heartfelt Dramedy
item.description: Though it could've had more depth, A Real Pain showcases Jesse Eisenberg's promise as a filmmaker in a touching dramedy with great performances.

item.title: Tom Holland & Austin Butler To Star As Real-Life Racecar Drivers Involved In Drug Smuggling & Money Laundering Scandal
item.description: Tom Holland and Austin Butler will star as real-life racecar drivers and brothers who were involved in a drug smuggling and money laundering scandal.

item.title: Blitz Review: Steve McQueen's Harrowing Drama Suffers From Emotional Detachment
item.description: I wanted to sit with the experiences of George and Rita as they go on very separate journeys throughout the film, but McQueen keeps us at a distance.
